name: ContentVersion
description: Represents a specific version of a Salesforce CRM Content document or Salesforce file.
summary:
The `ContentVersion` object in Salesforce represents a specific version of a content document and includes various attributes that provide detailed information about the content and its metadata. Here is a summary of its attributes:

1. **Id (id)**: Unique identifier for the content version.
2. **ContentDocumentId (reference)**: Reference to the parent `ContentDocument` object.
3. **IsLatest (boolean)**: Indicates if this is the latest version of the content.
4. **ContentUrl (url)**: URL to access the content.
5. **ContentBodyId (reference)**: Reference to the actual content body.
6. **VersionNumber (string)**: The version number of the content.
7. **Title (string)**: Title of the content.
8. **Description (textarea)**: Description of the content.
9. **ReasonForChange (string)**: Reason for the change in this version.
10. **SharingOption (picklist)**: Options for sharing the content.
11. **SharingPrivacy (picklist)**: Privacy settings for sharing.
12. **PathOnClient (string)**: File path on the client system.
13. **RatingCount (int)**: Total number of ratings received.
14. **IsDeleted (boolean)**: Indicates if the content version is deleted.
15. **ContentModifiedDate (datetime)**: Date and time when the content was last modified.
16. **ContentModifiedById (reference)**: Reference to the user who last modified the content.
17. **PositiveRatingCount (int)**: Number of positive ratings.
18. **NegativeRatingCount (int)**: Number of negative ratings.
19. **FeaturedContentBoost (int)**: Boost value for featured content.
20. **FeaturedContentDate (date)**: Date when the content was featured.
21. **OwnerId (reference)**: Reference to the owner of the content version.
22. **CreatedById (reference)**: Reference to the user who created the content version.
23. **CreatedDate (datetime)**: Date and time when the content version was created.
24. **LastModifiedById (reference)**: Reference to the user who last modified the content version.
25. **LastModifiedDate (datetime)**: Date and time when the content version was last modified.
26. **SystemModstamp (datetime)**: System modification timestamp.
27. **TagCsv (textarea)**: Tags associated with the content version in CSV format.
28. **FileType (string)**: Type of the file.
29. **PublishStatus (picklist)**: Status of the content version's publication.
30. **VersionData (base64)**: Data for the content version in base64 format.
31. **ContentSize (int)**: Size of the content in bytes.
32. **FileExtension (string)**: File extension of the content.
33. **FirstPublishLocationId (reference)**: Reference to the location where the content was first published.
34. **Origin (picklist)**: Origin of the content.
35. **ContentLocation (picklist)**: Location of the content.
36. **TextPreview (string)**: Text preview of the content.
37. **ExternalDocumentInfo1 (string)**: External document information field 1.
38. **ExternalDocumentInfo2 (string)**: External document information field 2.
39. **ExternalDataSourceId (reference)**: Reference to the external data source.
40. **Checksum (string)**: Checksum for the content.
41. **IsMajorVersion (boolean)**: Indicates if this is a major version.
42. **IsAssetEnabled (boolean)**: Indicates if the content version is asset-enabled.

These attributes help manage and track various aspects of content versions within Salesforce, including metadata, sharing settings, and publication status.
label: Content Version
